description:
Confidence Estimation for Mass Spectrometry Proteomics. Crema is an open-source Python tool that estimates the false discovery rate (FDR) of a set of peptide-spectrum matches
that result from proteomics data analysis. Crema implements standard FDR estimation methods that are widely used within
the field. This package is meant to be simple, easy to use, stand-along, and easy to maintain.
name: Noble-Lab/crema
